00031 #ifndef SNPTABLE_H
00032 #define SNPTABLE_H
00033 
00034 #include "file/TsvFile/TsvFile.h"
00035 //
00036 #include <cassert>
00037 //
00038 
00039 using namespace affx;
00040 class SnpTable {
00041 
00042 public:
00043 
00044   const static int NN = -1;
00045   const static int AA = 0;
00046   const static int AB = 1;
00047   const static int BB = 2;
00048 
00057   void open(const std::string& fileName) {
00058     affx::TsvFile tsv;
00059     std::string snpName;
00060     std::vector<int> gTypes;
00061     tsv.open(fileName);
00062     int colCount = tsv.getColumnCount(0);
00063     tsv.bind(0,"probeset_id", &snpName);
00064     gTypes.resize(colCount - 1);
00065     /* Bind up the variables. */
00066     for(int i = 1; i < colCount; i++) {
00067       std::string s;
00068       tsv.cidx2cname(0, i, s);
00069       m_ColNames.push_back(s);
00070       tsv.bind(0, i, &gTypes[i-1]);
00071       m_ColNameMap[s] = i - 1;
00072     }
00073     int count = 0;
00074     while(tsv.nextLevel(0) == TSV_OK) {
00075       m_RowNames.push_back(snpName);
00076       m_GTypes.push_back(gTypes);
00077       m_RowNameMap[snpName] = count++;
00078     }
00079     tsv.close();
00080   }
00081 
00085   inline int getNumRows() { return (int)m_GTypes.size(); }
00086 
00090   inline int getNumCols() { return m_GTypes.empty() ? 0 : (int)m_GTypes[0].size(); }
00091 
00092 
00097   inline const std::string &getRowName(int rowIx) {
00098     assert(rowIx < (int)m_RowNames.size());
00099     return m_RowNames[rowIx];
00100   }
00101 
00102 
00107   inline const std::string &getColName(int colIx) {
00108     assert(colIx < (int)m_ColNames.size());
00109     return m_ColNames[colIx];
00110   }
00111 
00119   int getRowIndex(const std::string &s) {
00120     std::map<std::string, int>::iterator iter = m_RowNameMap.find(s);
00121     if(m_RowNameMap.end() == iter) 
00122       return -1;
00123     else
00124       return iter->second;
00125   }
00126 
00134   int getColIndex(const std::string &s) {
00135     std::map<std::string, int>::iterator iter = m_ColNameMap.find(s);
00136     if(m_ColNameMap.end() == iter) 
00137       return -1;
00138     else
00139       return iter->second;
00140   }
00141 
00149   int getGenotypeForSnp(int rowIndex, int colIndex) {
00150     assert(rowIndex < (int)m_GTypes.size());
00151     assert(colIndex < (int)m_GTypes[0].size());
00152     return m_GTypes[rowIndex][colIndex];
00153   }
00154 
00155 private:
00157   std::vector<std::string> m_RowNames;        
00159   std::vector<std::string> m_ColNames;
00162   std::map<std::string, int> m_RowNameMap;
00165   std::map<std::string, int> m_ColNameMap;
00167   std::vector<std::vector<int> > m_GTypes;
00168 
00169 };

00171 #endif /* SNPTABLE_H */
